# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner entities have no fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them.
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that the entity has access to the required source items before attempting to use it.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that the entity has the required ingredients before attempting to use it.
### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that entities are properly connected before attempting to use them.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them.
### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient supply of fluids before attempting to use them.
### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have a sufficient supply of items before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or assigned in the provided execution logs.
